sentences.sContent: ...perhaps limiting the range of jobs that offer realistic choices...
...they're also realistic about the risks and dangers that lie ahead when the next five billion people come online...

synos.tran: 现实的；现实主义的；逼真的；实在论的

words.tran: 现实主义；实在论；现实主义的态度和行为

trans.tranCn: 现实的； 实际可行的； 现实主义的； 逼真的
trans.tranOther: judging and dealing with situations in a practical way according to what is actually possible rather than what you would like to happen
